article:
Events
* c. 1478 BCâ1390 BCâHand mirror, Eighteenth dynasty of Egypt, is made. It is
  now at The Brooklyn Museum of Art, New York.
* c. 1473 BCâHatshepsut (18th dynasty) started to rule. She is a daughter of
  Thutmose I. Married to her half brother Thutmose II.
* c. 1473 BCâ1458 BC â Funerary Temple of Hatshepsut, Deir el Bahri is built.
  Eighteenth dynasty of Egypt.
* c. 1473 BCâ1458 BCâHatshepsut as sphinx, from Deir el-Bahri was made.
  Eighteenth dynasty of Egypt. It is now in the Metropolitan Museum of
  Art, New York.

Significant people
* Thutmose III of Egypt, Pharaoh of the Eighteenth dynasty (1479 BCâ1425 BC). He
  was the first who called himself "pharaoh".
* Hatshepsut of Egypt, female Pharaoh of the 18th Dynasty (1473 BCâ1458 BC).
